thread.section_title: Redding Medical Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redding Medical Inc. | www.reddingmedical.com
thread.title: Christina Connelly
thread.title_full: Redding Medical Inc. reviewed by Christina Connelly

author: Christina Connelly
title: Christina Connelly
text: Store is bright and cheery. Lots of selection. The sales team is extremely helpful. I always get a cal when my order is in for pick up. I've recommended the store to a number of people I work with. I even picked up an item for the office and gave my boss the business card. I highly recommend the store. Folks at work love my uniforms.
